summary: A multi-tab app (likely a VAT/Invoice management tool) where users can enter transactions, calculate VAT, and generate invoices. Key navigation includes back buttons on all tabs and a Generate Invoice button on the VAT Calculation Summary column that flows transaction data into the Invoice tab.
architectural_notes: Transaction tab data should flow into the Invoice tab when Generate Invoice is triggered
All tabs require a Back button for navigation to previous screens

existing_features.title: Add a 'Generate Invoice' button in the VAT Calculation Summary column on the Transaction tab. When clicked, it should pre-populate the Invoice tab with data from the current transaction (country, VAT rate, VAT type, net amount, gross amount, buyer type, and category), then navigate the user to the Invoice tab.

Add a 'Back' button on each tab (RegionSelect/Country, Transaction, Invoice, API Docs) that navigates the user to the previous screen, allowing them to make changes. The back button on the first screen (Country/RegionSelect) should be hidden or disabled since there is no prior screen.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a Generate Invoice button on the VAT Calculation Summary column that flows transaction tab data into the Invoice tab
Add a Back button on all tabs so users can navigate to previous screens to make changes
